nhc_headline: ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND A SIGNIFICANT FLOOD THREAT EXISTS TODAY ACROSS PORTIONS OF THE MID-ATLANTIC INTO UPSTATE NEW YORK...
summary:
...HEAVY RAINFALL AND A SIGNIFICANT FLOOD THREAT EXISTS TODAY ACROSS PORTIONS OF THE MID-ATLANTIC INTO UPSTATE NEW YORK...
 As of 11:00 AM EDT Fri Aug 9
 the center of Debby was located near 41.7, -77.7
 with movement NE at 37 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.
